txt.en: The net is poised to strike!
The lynx is caught!
After discovering that the lynx was a new mother, Adamanda has released the creature.\n\nYou should talk to Adamanda.
'There is no way the lynx can resist that pie! Now we hide and wait!'
'We did it! Woohoo!'
'Hail, Ashenfell! We are going to - well, hello. What do we have here?'
'Diamond! There you are!'
'I have been looking for you all day! What nonsense are you up to now?'
'Mother! We were enacting my Grand Plan! '
'You are looking at the first hobbit who will ride a ferocious large cat into battle!'
'What in the Shire would make you want to ride a lynx, you fool of a girl!'
'I may not be as large as Bullroarer Took, but our neighours will be inspired to greatness when they see me riding a lynx!'
'Oh, my dear. The folk of Yondershire are more likely to be inspired by your kindness and wise choices that benefit the entire town.'
Talk to Diamond
The pie is in an enticing spot
The waterfall is in eastern Clovengap.\n\nRÃºni the Lore-master believes there is a hidden cave behind the nearby waterfall. You should find the cave.
Talk to Adamanda
'I did hear tell that you were of great assistance to many today.'
'That is true. We did end up helping out a lot of folk.'
DNT -
'Or... that is, you would have, was Ashenfell not soon to be a nursing mother.'
'Alas, it seems that I shall not be getting a new steed today. Although... I could try to befriend one of her kits!\n\n'Well, that is an adventure for another day.'
Adamanda waits for you outside of Nobottle.\n\nYou should speak with Adamanda North-took.
Kneel behind the bush with Diamond
Talk to Adamanda
Instance: Springing the Grand Plan
Deep in the ground, in crystal-laden, fetid pools, an ancient evil spreads corruption.
Place the pie
Wait for the trap to be sprung
Adamanda waits for you outside of Nobottle.\n\nYou should speak with Adamanda North-took.
The path is in Yondershire.\n\nAdamanda North-took has asked you to set a trap along a path frequently used by the lynx.
Wait for the lynx to be caught.
With net and pie in hand, Diamond is ready to enact her Grand Plan and set a trap for her prey!

'I have been tracking a lynx for days, and he always comes down this path around this time of day. Let's look for a good place to hang the net. Here, you take it. Find a spot for the pie and then hang the net above it.'
Set the trap
Kneel behind the bush with Diamond
'Come, let us leave her to finish the pie in peace.'
Instance: Corruption's Source
